archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1068
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to have the option to be emailed a copy/'resume your purchase' of my cart, so that I can continue the buy journey at a later date without having to add my details again

properties.value: SC: OOTB there is a possibility to pickup the journey from SC as an existing customer with login Additionally an email should be sent in such cases. A personalized link that would bring the customer to countinue his buy journey. Expiry time of the basket should be configurable. More details in LLD.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
